descriptionlist.description:
BigSurExpanded is a theme with app icons based on the neumorphic style of
macOS 11.0 Big Sur, and the iconography of iOS.

screenshot.description: Home screen of my iPhone (6s Plus, iOS 14.2) with BSE installed

changelog.change:
This beta release contains 85 icons, all created by me in Sketch 70.

Icons, as of this release:
